QuestData.Title: Showdown
QuestData.Description: The time has come for us to face Goc, the master of the Bladespire ogres. It is also time that I take a hand in events, to see the last of the gronn's life.$b$bTake my signet ring. When you come to the Altar of Goc, use it, and I will come to join you.$b$bTogether we will destroy Goc.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Sablemane's Signet at the Altar of Goc, then kill Goc.
QuestData.CompletionText: In time, all the sons of Gruul will be destroyed.
QuestData.RewardText: You fought surprisingly well for a $r, and it was an honor to have you at my side. My transformation must have been quite a surprise for you. I trust it was not too startling?$B$BLet us keep my true identity between the two of us for now, shall we? In return, and for your adept service, I grant you your choice of any of these baubles.
